HotelElement.Name: Long Lane Apartment - Calico house - House Of MoLI

Description.Text:
Our serviced apartments offer remarkable views across London, being in striking distance from Europe's tallest office building, The Shard, as well as other landmarks such as Tower Bridge and The Gherkin. You will benefit from plenty of natural light and great views with the large windows in every room while thesleek modern fittings and stylish furnishings give the apartment a relaxing atmosphere. Kept in neutral tones with wooden flooring and striking artwork, these serviced apartments come with many first-rate amenities such as complimentary WiFi, spacious living spaces, comfortable sleeping quarters, and fully equipped kitchens. Many amenities are located in your neighbourhood directly while London Bridge and Borough Underground Stations are just a brief walk away from your serviced apartment. A thrilling nightlife scene and lots of historic building add to the unique charm of your area. Perfect for business or leisure travellers, these apartments are all within easy reach of the City of London, Canary Wharf and the West End.
MoLi Apartments request guests to book prior to 1200 noon GMT (if the reservation is for the same day). * Credit cards incur a service charge for making payment (3.5 % on Master/ Visa and 4.5% on Amex) * We would require a copy of credit card authorization form of the guest / booker along with a scan copy of ID proof (valid passport/ driver's license) of the guest as well as third party if any. * We reserve the right to pre-authorize guest credit card with a 150 security deposit against any damages incurred during your stay.

The neighbourhood of Bermondsey is a living testament to the industrial revolution and the Victorian era. It is constantly reinventing itself and adding depth to the multifaceted character of the British capital. The famous Bermondsey Antiques Market and the recently-opened White Cube Gallery make this neighbourhood particularly appealing to art lovers. And with the tallest building in Europe, The Shard, at your doorsteps it will be hard for you to get lost.You will have easy access to many tourist attractions along the River Thames, such as Tower Bridge, the Tate Modern, the Globe Theatre, Borough Market and Southwark Cathedral. Shopping, dining and other leisure activities areof course abundant here along the River Thames as well. All in all, it's the perfect location for a perfect stay.

01 Bedroom Apartment - Apartment offers one double bed. Long Lane apartments welcome you with a bright and spacious lounge and a separate dining area that come alive with unstated, refined elegance. The stylish kitchen comes fitted with a full complement of appliances, crockery and cutlery, while the chic bathroom stirs things up with power shower and sleek fixtures and fittings. A generous complement of amenities and services like free wireless broadband Internet and weekly cleaning make your stay extremely pleasant. The well-appointed apartment is equipped with broadband Internet, fully-fitted kitchen and stylish bathroom with power shower.
02 Bedroom Apartment - Apartment offers two bedrooms and two bathrooms. Long Lane apartments welcome you with a bright and spacious lounge.
